column5: Mondul Seima district police found a man walking through the jungle from Thailand’s Trat province to Cambodia’s Koh Kong province. The man was in handcuffs and also wounded.------The man was a 34 year old
column7: currently living in Prey Svay village
column10: Prey Veng province.------How or why he was walking across the border in handcuffs in unclear
column11: but district police managed to free him. ------AREY
